title: Desertion (6U61)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	-1
Game Text:	To play, spot an [Isengard] Man. Plays on a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Assignment: Assign an [Isengard] minion with less strength than bearer to skirmish bearer. Discard this condition.
Lore:	”'Who knows what you've spoken to the darkness in the bitter watches of the night?'”
Rarity:	U
